scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: cd ./server && npm install && cd .. && cd ./client && npm install && tsc && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server && tsc && node dist/index.js
scripts.debug: npm install && cd ./client && npm run build && cd .. && node server/dist/index.js
scripts.test: cd ./server && npm install && npm run test
